add_to_contest.error_occurred: An error occurred trying to submit your scene:
add_to_contest.subtitle: Submit your scene now to earn 100 MANA (worth $5 USD). Please review your project and contact info below before you submit.
add_to_contest.success_subtitle: Your scene looks really nice, thank you for your submission!
add_to_contest.title: Submit your scene

banners.contest_winners: The Creator Contest has ended! See the winners {link}.
banners.promo_subtitle: The Pirate Pack for the Builder has just set sail! Build scenes telling tales of treasure and adventure with hundreds of new pirate-themed items.

banner.text: Submit your most creative scenes, and earn a share of the purse:{br}{mana} and {land} (over {usd}!)
banner.title: Calling all Builders!

contest.incentive_banner: Submit your scene to the contest to earn 100 MANA (worth $5 USD)!

custom_layout_modal.subtitle_one: You can create custom layouts for your scene.
custom_layout_modal.subtitle_two: Enter values in the inputs below for the desired size.

deploy_modal.description: Coming soon, you’ll be able to publish scenes directly from the Builder to your LAND! Subscribe to the Builder mailing list, and we’ll let you know when the feature is ready.
deploy_modal.title: Publish to your LAND

error_page.subtitle: There was an error, this is all we know:
error_page.title: Oops!

export_modal.description: You can backup your scene for use elsewhere. This is a great way to share scenes and collaborate with friends!
export_modal.title: Download scene

home_page.subtitle: With easy-to-use tools and hundreds of 3D items to choose from, the Builder makes world building fun. Let your creativity loose.
home_page.templates_title: Choose the size of your scene to get started
home_page.title: Build something Cool!

import_modal.cta: Drag your scene .zip file here, or {action}
import_modal.description: You can upload any scene made with the Builder!
import_modal.title: Upload scene

mobile_page.gallery_title: Check out work from Builder users!
mobile_page.message: The Builder is only available on desktop right now. Sign up to receive updates and check it out on your computer.
mobile_page.reminder_body:
Hey there!

Whoops! It looks like you tried to use the Builder from a mobile device!
The Builder only runs on desktop and laptop computers. Grab your nearest computer, and try again at https://builder.decentraland.org

Happy building!

The Decentraland Team

secondary_hero.title: Want to build something when you get to your computer?

mobile_page.success: Thanks, we will keep you posted!

not_found_page.subtitle: Sorry, we couldn't find the scene you were looking for

project_card.confirm_delete_content: Are you sure you want to delete your scene "{title}"? This operation is not reversible

project_layout_picker.max_area_error: Your scene can't have more than {area} parcels

toasts.localstorage: Scenes automatically save to your browser's storage

slide0.description: This is Decentraland’s new scene builder. Before you get started, let us show you around.
slide0.title: Welcome to the Builder!

slide1.description: To move an object, click and drag the object.
slide1.title: Moving objects

slide2.description: Add objects to your scene from the sidebar on the right.
slide2.title: Adding objects

slide3.description: Rotate objects by clicking on the Rotate tool and dragging the orbits.
slide3.title: Arrows and orbits

slide4.description: Drag with the left button to rotate the camera. Use the right button to pan.
slide4.title: Controlling the camera

slide5.description: When your scene is finished, click {submitButton} to submit it to the Creator Contest.
slide5.email_cta: Sign up for Builder and contest updates:
slide5.title: Participate in the contest

tutorial_modal.subtitle: The Builder is super easy to use, here are some tips before you begin
tutorial_modal.title: Get started with the Builder

unsupported_browser_page.subtitle: The Builder does not support your browser.{br}Please visit this page using {chrome} or {firefox}
unsupported_browser_page.title: Oops!

description.length: Description length must be between {min} and {max} characters.

title.length: Title length must be between {min} and {max} characters.
